summary: bro why does it look like they’ve forgotten the concept of personal space in the comfort of the other’s presence before suddenly...
body: bro why does it look like they’ve forgotten the concept of personal space in the comfort of the other’s presence before suddenly realizing their faces are exceptionally close and yearning to share the world’s softest smooch?

summary: Moomintrolls in love
title: Moomintrolls in love
body:
Disclaimer: This is my interpretations of relationships from canon and headcanon. If you read something you don’t like, kindly move on.

~

Moomintrolls with friends and family:

Family for a Moomintroll is very important. Extended families often live together in the same stove pipe, or more rarely in homes they’ve built themselves in other places. It’s not unusual for a young Moomintroll to live with their parents way into adult hood, or to never leave at all. If/when a Moomintroll leaves home, they will make sure to live close by and visit often. 


The Moomin family we know is no exception to this. Moominmamma and Moominpappa do not consider it unusual or bad for Moomintroll to live with them, nor would they prevent him from leaving if he decided to do so. The Moomintroll family in general treats friends as though they were family and will often make accommodations for them even at the expense of their own happiness. When Moominmamma and Moomintroll first find Sniff, they have no problem taking him with them and letting him live with them as a kind of ‘younger brother’ to Moomintroll.

Moomintroll himself is especially victim to this over-exertion in order to please others (even helping Stinky eat his own house, for example!) as he hates to displease people and hasn’t developed the knowledge of when to say no that his parents have a slightly better grasp of. 

The Moomin house expands to accommodate all of their closest friends whether that friend is always around or not, and they have no qualms opening up their home to those who are strangers but may soon become friends. All Moomin are like this, as they are creatures who hearts only grow larger to accommodate more people.

The love of the family is very strong. They protect each other, they support each other, sometimes they might quarrel but they tend to forgive each other very easily. Although one might seek to accuse Mamma and Pappa of ‘babying’ Moomintroll, this is far from the truth. Although they want to make sure he’s prepared for everything, they would never stop him from going off on adventures on his own. 

The ideal Moomintroll family includes anywhere from one to four children, but is rarely too large, as extended cousins and friends often take up a lot in a Moomintrolls life, filling the family void.

It’s hard for Moomintroll to stay mad at his friends, even when they probably deserve it. Not that he won’t tell them off for doing something that upsets him or other people. Moomintroll is the most dependent on others of all the Moomin family, but as he grows he learns the different ways a person can be friends with another and be close to them even when they’re not around. 

Moomintrolls in love.

Love for a Moomintroll is very special and rarely comes only once. A young Moomintroll is heavily expected to have a great number of crushes of any gender, whether the object of affection is real or fictional. It’s seen as healthy for them to explore their interests in this manner. 

However, Moomintrolls are not heartbreakers. They may crush easily but they fall in love only a handful of times. Moominmamma and Pappa are such a case in which the love they feel might look strange to an outsider. They seem to be complete opposites, but in actually the things that are different between them make the similarities feel all that more special. Moomintrolls usually work better with someone who has a lot of differences to them, as it helps to balance out their large personalities. They are fond of holding paws and rubbing noses together as signs of affection.

Moomintroll crushes on pictures, Prima Donna’s and the figureheads of ships. He also feels genuine love for both the Snork Maiden and Snufkin. The Snork Maiden is one of Moomintrolls very first loves. He views her as lovely beyond compare, but often falls short in his gestures to her because of her particular idea about how love and romance is supposed to work. Both of their ideas on the matter are very juvenile and indeed it seems they are just playing at being together, with Snork Maiden happily going off with other would-be boyfriends but delighting in Moomintroll showing grand romantic gestures of jealousy over her. At times, Moomintroll has upset the Snork Maiden through simply not understand the intense masculine role she expects him to play. Other times, he elaborately gushes over her in their play pretend of gender roles and relationship. In the end of the tales as we know them, he remembers her fondly as ‘his friend with the bangle.’

Snufkin is a tricky matter. Moomintroll hasn’t yet gotten to the point where he realises it’s fine to love a person of his own gender. The two are opposites, but get along extremely well. They grow from each other, balancing being alone with being together, learning that it’s ok to love and be loved and that that doesn’t mean smothering each other all of the time. Moomintrolls love is so deep as to become physically sick when Snufkin has gone and Snufkin too starts to feel those affects too. Even when Moomintroll begins to realise his feelings he still has the idea that as a man he can’t admit such feelings for another man ‘one doesn’t say it’ as he says. In time, Moomintroll will realise that it is perfectly ok and if he can warm the heart of a Mumrik he can warm anything.
body_abstract:
Disclaimer: This is my interpretations of relationships from canon and headcanon. If you read something you don’t like, kindly move on.

~

Moomintrolls with friends and family:

Family for a Moomintroll is very important. Extended families often live together in the same stove pipe, or more rarely in homes they’ve built themselves in other places. It’s not unusual for a young Moomintroll to live with their parents way into adult hood, or to never leave at all. If/when a Moomintroll leaves home, they will make sure to live close by and visit often.

Other times, he elaborately gushes over her in their play pretend of gender roles and relationship. In the end of the tales as we know them, he remembers her fondly as ‘his friend with the bangle.’

Snufkin is a tricky matter. Moomintroll hasn’t yet gotten to the point where he realises it’s fine to love a person of his own gender. The two are opposites, but get along extremely well. They grow from each other, balancing being alone with being together, learning that it’s ok to love and be loved and that that doesn’t mean smothering each other all of the time. Moomintrolls love is so deep as to become physically sick when Snufkin has gone and Snufkin too starts to feel those affects too. Even when Moomintroll begins to realise his feelings he still has the idea that as a man he can’t admit such feelings for another man ‘one doesn’t say it’ as he says. In time, Moomintroll will realise that it is perfectly ok and if he can warm the heart of a Mumrik he can warm anything.

summary: Moomin MBTI head cannons!!
body:
Moomin MBTI head cannons!!

(Note this isn’t supper accurate, since I’m not a super genius when it comes to this. So if you want to change some things, feel free to do so! :D)

Moomin: ESFP

Snufkin: ISTJ or ISTP

Snorkmaiden: ENFP

Little My: ESTP or ISFP

Sniff: ENTJ or ENFP

Moominmamma: ISFJ

Moominpappa: ENTP

Too-Ticky: INFJ or INFP

Snork: INTJ

Mr. Hemulin: INTP

Mrs. Fillyjonk: ESTJ

Joxter: ISTP

Muddler: ISFP

Hodgkins: ENTJ

Mymble: ESFP or ESFJ

Mymble Jr.: ENFP

(Feel free to add more if you like :D)

blog.name: teddiroo
blog.title: Home is Where Moomin is-Snufkin Probably
blog.description: Theodore "Teddy" Maxwell aka Floof |Current Kin:Snufkin| Here in this house we love the Moomins (Especially Moomintroll) | 21 | ♍| Genderfluid (He/him preferred) | In a open relationship with Miss Molly, the lovely lady behind the-fandom-meme 🐚💘🐻 | Kin safe blog | I draw, write, sing, and dabble in many interests. I also love being gay and spreading crime 🌱

summary: So. I'm not sure why I didn't post this sooner, but this here. One of the best gifts I've ever received from @alieninsider a lil...
body:
So. I’m not sure why I didn’t post this sooner, but this here. One of the best gifts I’ve ever received from @alieninsider a lil while back when she returned back from a con down in Florida. And honestly, it’s gonna be helpful writing my fics too 💓 this is just one of the cutest and most creative things I’ve ever seen, and, it comes out with some really funny rolls too. You just roll them and take three per part of your story. A beginning, a middle, and an end.

My first roll was. Snufkin sitting by the waterfall on a fall day. Thingummy came down on a toboggan with some supplies. And the Groke appeared rolling down a hill in a barrel full of preserves. Let’s just say they had a lovely picnic.

I arranged them to my favorite cubes /w \ Top row:Hobgoblin’s hat, Stinky, and Lonely.

Middle row: Waterfall, Snufkin, Moomin

Bottom row: Spring, Pocket Knife, Moominpappa’s diary

Bottom row: Spring, Pocket Knife, Moominpappa’s diary

trail.content_raw:
So. I’m not sure why I didn’t post this sooner, but this here. One of the best gifts I’ve ever received from @alieninsider a lil while back when she returned back from a con down in Florida. And honestly, it’s gonna be helpful writing my fics too 💓 this is just one of the cutest and most creative things I’ve ever seen, and, it comes out with some really funny rolls too. You just roll them and take three per part of your story. A beginning, a middle, and an end.

My first roll was. Snufkin sitting by the waterfall on a fall day. Thingummy came down on a toboggan with some supplies. And the Groke appeared rolling down a hill in a barrel full of preserves. Let’s just say they had a lovely picnic.

I arranged them to my favorite cubes /w \ Top row:Hobgoblin’s hat, Stinky, and Lonely.

Middle row: Waterfall, Snufkin, Moomin

Bottom row: Spring, Pocket Knife, Moominpappa’s diary
trail.content:
So. I’m not sure why I didn’t post this sooner, but this here. One of the best gifts I’ve ever received from @alieninsider a lil while back when she returned back from a con down in Florida. And honestly, it’s gonna be helpful writing my fics too 💓 this is just one of the cutest and most creative things I’ve ever seen, and, it comes out with some really funny rolls too. You just roll them and take three per part of your story. A beginning, a middle, and an end.

My first roll was. Snufkin sitting by the waterfall on a fall day. Thingummy came down on a toboggan with some supplies. And the Groke appeared rolling down a hill in a barrel full of preserves. Let’s just say they had a lovely picnic.

I arranged them to my favorite cubes /w \ Top row:Hobgoblin’s hat, Stinky, and Lonely.

Middle row: Waterfall, Snufkin, Moomin

Bottom row: Spring, Pocket Knife, Moominpappa’s diary

blog.name: thefearisoneself
blog.title: You know. Me, Chad of Camelot.
blog.description: Hello! Please call me Jir! While I reblog lots of things my art is all under my Moominvalley tag, please check it out! I'm a 21 year old girl with High functioning Autism from Canada. My current biggest fandom is Moomins with my favourite character being Snufkin. I am also a fan of Wander over Yonder, Star vs the Forces of Evil, Steven Universe, Ducktales, Undertale, Gravity Falls, the Adventure Zone, OK KO and We Bare Bears. If you have any questions or just want to tell me something, go right ahead, don't be afraid to ask! Just please nothing rude.

summary: Snufmin Week Day 4-Fancy/Formalwear!  Snufkin’s coat is already like a dress and suits are very restricting, so I gave him a...

Snufmin Week Day 4-Fancy/Formalwear! 

Snufkin’s coat is already like a dress and suits are very restricting, so I gave him a cute, green dress! Moomintroll respects Moominpapa immensely so he wants to dress up like him.

summary: So I watched A Comet in Moominland from 1992 last night and it got me really excited thinking about the new series doing its own...
body:
So I watched A Comet in Moominland from 1992 last night and it got me really excited thinking about the new series doing its own rendition of that. It would definitely be a bit different since in the new series it seems that Moomin already knew Snufkin and Snorkmaiden long before he met Little My, so it might not be a prequel kind of story. Tho I don’t think it would really change much tbh, the plot could easily stay the same, they would just have to take out the “first meeting” element with Snufkin and Snorkmaiden (unless they don’t include Little My, but why would they do that??)

It might actually make it more interesting if this happened a little later after the cast all got to know each other better. Maybe it would make it more exciting and raise the stakes!

I have never read any of the books so I’m not sure how close this movie was to the source material lol, but I think another rendition for the new series would be awesome! What do y'all think?

trail.content:
So I watched A Comet in Moominland from 1992 last night and it got me really excited thinking about the new series doing its own rendition of that. It would definitely be a bit different since in the new series it seems that Moomin already knew Snufkin and Snorkmaiden long before he met Little My, so it might not be a prequel kind of story. Tho I don’t think it would really change much tbh, the plot could easily stay the same, they would just have to take out the “first meeting” element with Snufkin and Snorkmaiden (unless they don’t include Little My, but why would they do that??)

It might actually make it more interesting if this happened a little later after the cast all got to know each other better. Maybe it would make it more exciting and raise the stakes!

I have never read any of the books so I’m not sure how close this movie was to the source material lol, but I think another rendition for the new series would be awesome! What do y'all think?

summary: So I finished my Business culminating assignment (it is due next Monday, each document [5 of them] got two days each to work on...
caption:
So I finished my Business culminating assignment (it is due next Monday, each document [5 of them] got two days each to work on + finish but I was faster paced and finished early XD) And I had and still have lots of free time
This is what I did yesterday and a bit today (plus my friend had an unrelated contribution XD)
Also I smudged that small Snufkin and don’t know if it makes it seem better or worse XD
